text:
This song is so beautiful.

The first time I heard it, when you are with Bianca in the haunted castle, I couldn't think of anything but my own childhood with my friend ( who was a girl).

During the game, I was always thinking of my childhood.
Bianca and my friend are so similar.

This game is great.
author: Giorgio Parmanie
